string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: This is the best of all possible worlds.
He who hasn\'t tasted bitter things hasn\'t earned sweet things.
He who does not act does not exist.
It is not knowledge, but the act of learning, not possession but the act of getting there, which grants the greatest enjoyment.
When a philosopher says something that is true then it is trivial. When he says something that is not trivial then it is false.
Nothing takes place in the world whose meaning is not that of some maximum or minimum.
For the sake of brevity, we will always represent this number 2.718281828459… by the letter e.
